## Gráficos


::: {.cell hash='aula4_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_fa9f11ee3c08d636828d66a60f958b26'}

```{.r .cell-code}
curve |> 
  ggplot(aes(Irrigation, severity,
             shape = Irrigation))+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula4_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_4842fe1c0fbc119cef4a203bb0d5e274'}

```{.r .cell-code}
curve2 <- curve |> 
  select(day, rep, severity) |> 
  group_by(day) |> 
  summarize(sev = mean(severity))
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula4_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_40cdfaf30a613c85db5f99e4ece2b5ce'}

```{.r .cell-code}
curve2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(day, sev*100))+
  geom_line(color = "darkorange")+
  geom_point(size = 3,
             color = "darkorange")+
   scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0,7, 14, 21, 28, 35, 42, 49, 56, 63))+
  scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 5,
                     limits = c(0,100))+
    labs(x = "Time (days)",
         y = "Severity (%)",
         title = "My first disease progress curve",
         subtitle = "Using ggplot",
         caption = "Source: FIP 606")+
  theme_light()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
